xml.name: Rename
xml.Try: To rename anything put the caret at some occurence and use Rename refactoring. Put the caret to the field deviceName in any place of code and start renaming by pressing RenameElement
Write another name for this field instead selected. For example type tabletName and save the result by taping EditorEnter
automatically recognizes getter for renaming fields and also recommends to refactor it. Put the caret to the field stylus and activate renaming with RenameElement
Replace stylus with pencil, for example, and complete refactoring with EditorEnter
